title.rendered: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power

content.rendered:
Creators Patrick McKay. John D. Payne

Directed by Wayne Yip. J.A. Bayona. Charlotte Brändström

Ema Horvath( Eärien4 episodes, 2022 ). Owain Arthur( Prince Durin IV4 episodes, 2022 ). Phil Grieve( Bazur / …4 episodes, 2022 ). Edward Clendon( Grugzûk / …4 episodes, 2022 ). Luke Hawker( Magrot / …4 episodes, 2022 ). Justin Doble( Milky-Eyed Patron / …4 episodes, 2022 ). Leon Wadham( Kemen3 episodes, 2022 ). Ian Blackburn( Rowan3 episodes, 2022 ). Benjamin Walker( High King Gil-galad3 episodes, 2022 ). Ken Blackburn( Tar-Palantir3 episodes, 2022 ). Sophia Nomvete( Princess Disa3 episodes, 2022 ). Peter Mullan( King Durin III3 episodes, 2022 ). Edith Poor( The Nomad3 episodes, 2022 ). Bridie Sisson( The Dweller3 episodes, 2022 ). Kali Kopae( The Ascetic3 episodes, 2022 ). Will Fletcher( Finrod2 episodes, 2022 ). Augustus Prew( Médhor2 episodes, 2022 ). Simon Merrells( Watchwarden Revion2 episodes, 2022 ). Antonio Te Maioha( Sail Master2 episodes, 2022 ). Jason Hood( Tamar2 episodes, 2022 ). Paula Nazarski( Malva’s Sister2 episodes, 2022 ). Preston O’Brien( Guardsman Two2 episodes, 2022 ). Phil Vaughan( Smithy2 episodes, 2022 ). Michael Morris( Guardsman One2 episodes, 2022 ). Mana Hira Davis( Worker One2 episodes, 2022 ). Winham Hammond( Worker Two2 episodes, 2022 ). Amelie Child Villiers( Young Galadriel1 episode, 2022 ). Fabian McCallum( Thondir1 episode, 2022 ). Kip Chapman( Rían1 episode, 2022 ). Miranda Wilson( Southlander Woman1 episode, 2022 ). Berynn Schwerdt( Eamon1 episode, 2022 ). Rob McKenzie( Archer1 episode, 2022 ). Virginie Laverdure( Abigail1 episode, 2022 ). Jesse Turner( General Orc1 episode, 2022 ). Jane Montgomery Griffiths( Astrid1 episode, 2022 ). Michael Homick( Skirmish Orc1 episode, 2022 ). Kimo Houltham( Númenórean Soldier1 episode, 2022 ). Megan Lilly Wilding( Dwarf Guard1 episode, 2022 ). Laura Medes( Young Mother1 episode, 2022 ). Carmel McGlone( Edda1 episode, 2022 ). Paul Ballard( Sour-Faced Dwarf1 episode, 2022 ). Ellyce Bisson( Fighting Orc1 episode, 2022 ). Josh Metcalfe( Elven Loremaster1 episode, 2022 ). Jagger Serafin( Elf Child1 episode, 2022 ). James Munro( Dwarf Lord One1 episode, 2022 ). Travis Graham( Beady-Eyed Dwarf1 episode, 2022 ). Rob Mackinnon( Fighting Orc1 episode, 2022 ). Michael Jones( Dwarf Lord Two1 episode, 2022 ). Hori Ahipene( Fighting Orc1 episode, 2022 ). Eva Gardner( Elf Child1 episode, 2022 ). Adam Faiz( Guild Merchant1 episode, 2022 ). Rosalie Button( Survivor on Raft #11 episode, 2022 ). Tim McLachlan( Fighting Orc1 episode, 2022 ). Oscar Beszant( Elf Child1 episode, 2022 ). Ashlee Fidow( Elf Soldier1 episode, 2022 ). Matt Bennett( Survivor on Raft #21 episode, 2022 ). Carl Van Roon( Elf Soldier1 episode, 2022 ). Nathan Mennis( Digger Orc1 episode, 2022 ). Sean Neary( Elf Soldier1 episode, 2022 ). Cameron Brown( Elf Soldier1 episode, 2022 ). Andrew Cottle( Veteran Elf1 episode, 2022 ). Dave Chapman( Masked Dwarf Guard1 episode, 2022 ). Kenneth Ransom( Younger Hunter1 episode, 2022 ). Tom McCathie( Ornery Hunter1 episode, 2022 ). Gabe Wright( Messenger1 episode, 2022 ). Rachel Payne( Dwarf Singer1 episode, 2022 ). Shelley Waddams( Elf Attendant1 episode, 2022 ). Graham Ralls( Whiskery Old Man1 episode, 2022 ). Ella Hope-Higginson( Mairen1 episode, 2022 ). Ben Fransham( Elf Soldier1 episode, 2022 ). Nicholas Foustellis( Short-Haired Elf1 episode, 2022 ). Tony McCarthy( Warlord orc (uncredited)2 episodes, 2022 ). Marris Collins( Village Man (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 ). Amand Weaver( Imprisoned Farmer (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 )

Language English

Producers Belén Atienza. J.A. Bayona. Jason Cahill. Justin Doble. Callum Greene. Gennifer Hutchison. Patrick McKay. John D. Payne. Bruce Richmond. Sharon Tal Yguado. Lindsey Weber. Ron Ames. Stephany Folsom. Karine Galstian. Andrew Lee. Christopher Newman. Jake Rice. Wayne Yip. Helen Shang. Bryan Cogman. Eugene Kelly

Production Amazon Studios. Harper Collins Publishers. New Line Cinema.

Certificate 15+

Season 1

Episodes 8
